channel.title: Posts on Platypus NYC Events
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Platypus NYC Events

item.title: Discussion: Republicans and Riots (Date TBD)
item.description:
Join us for a reading and discussion of the article “Republicans and riots: The Left in death, 1992 and 2020” by Chris Cutrone (Platypus Review, July 2020). The meeting will be hosted by Patrick Zapien.

Location: online
Time: TBD
Details on how to join will be added to this page closer to the time of the event.

item.title: Teach-in: Capital In History
item.description:
Rana Urek will lead a teach-in on “Capital in history”, in which we will ask, what is the meaning of history for any purportedly Marxian Left?

Location: online
Time: TBD
Details on how to join will be added to this page closer to the time of the event.

item.title: Teach-in: Capital In History
item.description:
Dionysos Chatzitasis will lead a teach-in on “Capital in history”, in which we will ask, what is the meaning of history for any purportedly Marxian Left?
